Package org.easymock

Interface Summary
ArgumentsMatcher Deprecated. Since EasyMock 2.0, ArgumentsMatchers are only supported for the legacy MockControl.
IAnswer Used to answer expected calls.
IArgumentMatcher Decides whether an actual argument is accepted.
IExpectationSetters Allows setting expectations for an associated expected invocation.
IMocksControl Controls all the mock objects created by it.
 

Class Summary
AbstractMatcher Deprecated. Since EasyMock 2.0, ArgumentsMatchers are only supported for the legacy MockControl.
EasyMock  
LogicalOperator See EasyMock.cmp(java.lang.Object, java.util.Comparator, org.easymock.LogicalOperator)
MockControl Deprecated. Since EasyMock 2.0, static methods on EasyMock are used to create and control mock objects.
